title: OOL, looking for a team, or making a team
body: Hello, i am a gold 4 adc main looking for a team for the OOL or planning to make one for the upcoming OOL tournament, i can play most adc's and can solo lane when needed, if youd like to have me on the team, please contact me as my IGN is Cj Entus JT BBE, thanks! :D

replies.body:
I'm keen, send me a friend request. 

db
im keen for a ool team, im g4 support main but i can aslo play some junglers. And i have a s2 friend that might be keen
I sent you a friend request on league!
